title: Blast (Full Movie) Action, US Olympics Thriller, Rutger Hauer

sources.title: Blast (Full Movie) Action, US Olympics Thriller, Rutger Hauer
sources.description:
Terrorists are holding the U.S. Olympic swim team hostage, and only janitor Jack Bryant (Linden Ashby) can stop them.

Directed by Albert Pyun
Starring Linden Ashby, Rutger Hauer, Andrew Divoff, Kimberly Warren, Tim Thomerson, Sonya Eddy
1997

Edited for YouTube ad standards
